name: dogdogdogdogdog
description:
An open-world adventure game in which you play as a bold Shiba Inu that is on the hunt for his owner’s missing valuables. Inspired by the bright and welcoming styles of classic games such as The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Okami, Kingdom Hearts, and Donut County, this game aims to use simple techniques and mechanics to help make it easily playable and more accessible to anyone and everyone.

Developed over a semester in a team of 8.

go click on things and bark at em.
